bibl.title: Boorish or Bookish? Literature in Egyptian Villages in the Fayum in the Graeco-Roman Period.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Selection criteria. - Who were the owners? - The world view of the owners and readers. - Ranking of villages ("Top 10"). - Presentation. - Bakchias. - Euhemereia. - Hawara. - Karanis. - Kerkeosiris. - Narmouthis. - Philadelpheia. - Soknopaiou Nesos. - Tebtynis. - Theadelpheia.
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, Boorish or Bookish? Literature in Egyptian Villages in the Fayum in the Graeco-Roman Period.
